The Quranic researcher is the resurrection, and it is said to have a surah that I do not divide, and it is an angel from the story of a rivalry, no, and no deity, and it is different in the number of it.And the difference is in to hurry with it [the resurrection: 16].Fear them for their denials of the mission, he mentioned an arrogance and higher in this surah, which is indicative of it with a face of face, and described the day of resurrection, and the righteousness The spirit of the spirit of the body, then what was accepted from the principle of creation on the revelation of the existing structure, and he said: Glory to a great saying: In the name of God, the Most Merciful, the Most Merciful.The introduction of the navigator is a picture of the act of the division, which is improvised in their words and their poems.Bin Salami Yarati: ؎ I did not call an imam with an involvement ∗∗∗ to grieve me, so there is no way to you and the summary of what God has gone to, the neighbor of God in that, that there is no one if this is in the words of the words.So, your Lord does not believe [Women: 65], it is a link (P-136) that is added to the affirmation of the oath, the same as it is in his saying, so that he does not know [Al-Hadid: 29] Come, as in this surah and the wall of the country, it is for the negation, because the prayer is in your authority and its face that the creation of the oath is in the way of the segment of It is a denial of that implicit news on the way of the kinna, and it is intended that it is not glorified by the division because it is a great division that is divided into it from the first The affirmation of the division of it, as the exaggeration is in the way of the division of the division in it Creation, so it is not due as an answer, and that the meaning is the greatest of the division of it, not the division of it is a burden, and the quarrels of that are sayings, and it is said that it is for the exile.And Al -Farah said: To exile words with a grace before the division and his response, as if they were here to denounce the resurrection, then it was said no, that is, the matter is like that, then it was said that I divide the imam and the imam of the imam.With the return of the navigator after it and it was said that it is not no, but the imam was saturated, and it was open, so it appeared from that thousand and the origin.Al -Bazi and Al -Hassan, and she is the mother of the ritual, with some, and the origin is “because I divide” and delete the beginning for the knowledge of it and the words of the affirmation, I have entered the Let them rule among them [bee: 124], and the origin is that I do not divide with some, and the oath is the oath, and the nobility of the confirmation is not accompanied On the authority of Sibui with the bid In the sense of others.And the gathering said: It is a link and his choice is the neighbor of God in the detail and what is mentioned from the seal is not a Muslim, because if it is proven in the oath, then there is no difference between the words, and there is no difference between the words A Muslim, but the Qur’an is in the ruling of a single surah that is connected to each other, because it is like that, as well The ruling is then understood what he mentioned in the Nafi incineration from the memorizer by a distance, and the state of the quarrels of the sayings is not hidden, and it has passed through some of the words in that, so it is remembered.
